channel.title: Set up on Steven Golovkine
channel.description: Recent content in Set up on Steven Golovkine

item.title: Set up Julia
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance, dynamic programming language. It is used for high-performance numerical analysis and computational science.

item.title: Set up Hive
item.description: Apache Hive is a data warehouse software that facilitates the manipulation of large distributed datasets using SQL.

item.title: Set up Spark
item.description: Apache Spark is a software for large-scale data processing.

item.title: Set up Hadoop
item.description: Apache Hadoop is an open-source project for reliable, scalable and distributed computing.

item.title: Jupyter Notebook
item.description: Jupyter is a programming software which use notebooks widely used in data science.

item.title: Homebrew
item.description: Hombrew is a package manager for macOS. This software is a must to have for macOS users.

item.title: MySQL
item.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

item.title: Set up Python
item.description: Python is a programming language. It is used by a lot of people doing data science.

item.title: Set up R
item.description: R is a software for statistical computing and graphics. It is very easy to install on macOS.
